sentences.en: Abram went down into Egypt to sojourn there, for the famine was sore in the land.
sentences.cn: 亚巴郎遂下到埃及,寄居在那里, 因为那地方饥荒十分严重.

sentences.en: And if a stranger sojourn with thee in your land , ye shall not vex him.
sentences.cn: 33若有外人在你们国中和你同居, 就不可欺负他.

sentences.en: During a two years'sojourn in Italy, he had collected many good paintings and tasteful rarities.
sentences.cn: 他在意大利盘桓的两年中, 收集了许多名画和雅致的珍贵物品.

sentences.en: He could sojourn in the air for fifteen days and then go home safely.
sentences.cn: 他可以在空中待上十五天,然后安然返家.

sentences.en: He must sojourn in villages and hamlets.
sentences.cn: 他应该在乡村小住数日.

sentences.en: How will the costs arising from the sojourn in Switzerland be met?
sentences.cn: 如何承担在瑞士居留期间的生活费用?

sentences.en: I am already feeling better for my sojourn here; it is doing me good.
sentences.cn: 我在此逗留期间,觉得体力日渐恢复; 这对我大有裨益.

sentences.en: It would be cruel to begrudge your sojourn among flowers and fields.
sentences.cn: 如果嫉妒你逗留在鲜花与田野之间,那将是太不近人情的.

sentences.en: On her trip home, Jane will stop in St. Louis fou a twe - day sojourn with relatives.
sentences.cn: 在回家的路上, 简会在圣路易斯的亲戚家住两天.

sentences.en: Sojourn in this land, and I will be with thee, and will bless thee.
sentences.cn: 我要给你许许多多子孙, 像天空的星星那么多, 并且要把这土地赐给他们.

sentences.en: Woe is me , for I sojourn in Meshech, For I dwell among the tents of Kedar!
sentences.cn: 诗120:5我寄居在米设 、 住在基达帐棚之中、有祸了.

sentences.en: Woe is me , that I sojourn in Mesech, that I dwell in the tents Kedar!
sentences.cn: 5我寄居在米设, 住在基达帐棚之中,有祸了!

sentences.en: Woe is me , that I sojourn in Mesech, that I dwell in the tents of Kedar!
sentences.cn: 5我寄居在米设, 住在基达帐棚之中,有祸了.
